name: politico

name: politico
text:
#RNC2020 has been appealing to black voters all week.

But @PoliticoCharlie offers this reminder: Trump doesn‚Äôt have to do well with Black voters for the RNC to be a success. He just needs to pare down Biden‚Äôs margins in places like Milwaukee and Detroit

name: politico
text:
WH adviser Ja'Ron Smith praised Trump‚Äôs reaction to a series of murders of Black men this year that prompted protests over racial injustice and police violence, calling out Ahmaud Arbery, George Floyd and LeGend Taliferro by name.

More #RNC moments: https://t.co/T7DuH2nw2m https://t.co/mSERtA7EZ4

name: politico
text:
Smith has been an assistant to the president for domestic policy since April 2019.

And he cited Trump's record on prison reform and securing ‚Äúrecord and permanent‚Äù funding for HBCUs as evidence of his commitment to Black Americans https://t.co/9zIVm4unYO

text:

name: politico
text:

name: politico
text:
Ben Carson gave the first words of empathy for the family of Jacob Blake:

"Our hearts go out to the Blake family," he said, later adding, "Necessary change comes through hope and love‚Äînot senseless and destructive violence."

text:

text:

text:
